description:
Anime Gintama enters its second year on air! Well, more like manages to slide by for a second year. Either way it’s the second season, as the Odd Jobs crew reflect on “securing a one-year slot on air” and reminisce about the many events that occurred in the past year. As expectations of high ratings have given way to many hardships, Gintoki suggests that something needs to be done as the series continues on...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mitei wa Mitei de Atte Kettei Dewanai
Undecided Is Undecided and It`s Not a Decision
Unentschieden ist unentschieden und es ist keine Entscheidung
未定は未定であって決定ではない
